AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Sponsorship Location Hierarchy Add Form Extension
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Add a new sponsorship location at the root of the hierarchy. Extended to include Report Recipient.
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_SPONSORSHIPLOCATION_HIERARCHYEXTENSION ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @REPORTRECIPIENTID uniqueidentifier = null ) as begin
set nocount on;
set @ID = @CONTEXTID
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @currentDate datetime set @currentDate = getdate()
begin try -- handle inserting the data insert into dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONEXTENSION (ID, REPORTRECIPIENTID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@ID, @REPORTRECIPIENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @currentDate, @currentDate)
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0 end
